snippet: Often castigated by the United States over its record on rights, democracy and civil liberties, Russia seized on the report to turn the tables on Washington.
lead_paragraph: Often castigated by the United States over its record on rights, democracy and civil liberties, Russia seized on the report to turn the tables on Washington.

headline.main: Russia Denounces U.S. Over C.I.A. Torture Report
